page.title: 04HEALTH IN SHELDON
page.content: WE HAVE NO DOCTOR'S SURGERY OR HOSPITAL AND NEED TO TRAVEL TO BAKEWELL, BUXTON OR CHESTERFIELD FOR THESE SERVICES. PEOPLE ARE NOTED FOR LIVING A LONG LIFE UP HERE, EVEN THOUGH WE HAVE A FAIRLY SEVERE CLIMATE DUE TO THE ALTITUDE OF OVER 300 METRES ABOVE SEA LEVEL.WE ARE ALSO ON THE EDGE OF A PLATEAU. THERE HAVE BEEN 3 DEATHS THIS YEAR BUT ALL WERE OLDER PEOPLE IN THEIR LATE 70'S AND 80'S. LAST YEAR OUR OLDEST INHABITANT DIED AGED 91 YEARS. A MOBILE PHYSIOTHERAPY UNIT DOES COME TO THE VILLAGE FOR THOSE WHO NEED IT.
